patthana15.31:1.1: Kenaci viññeyyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakenaci viññeyyo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
patthana15.31:2.1: Kenaci viññeyyaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakenaci viññeyyo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
patthana15.31:3.1: Kenaci viññeyyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nakenaci viññeyyo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
